mapper.select: select count(*) from agt_indent ai left join sys_user_company suc on suc.user_id = ai.sys_user_id left join rel_agt_company ac on ac.company_id = suc.company_id left join sys_company com on com.company_id = suc.company_id where ac.agt_id=#{id} and com.company_state=0

select * from agt_user au left join rel_agt_company ac on ac.agt_id = au.u_id left join sys_company sc on sc.company_id = ac.company_id left join sys_role sr on sr.role_id = au.roleId where au.u_id=#{id} and sc.company_state=1 and u_status=1
mapper.update: update agt_user set u_status=#{u_status} where u_id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from agt_user au left join sys_role sr on sr.role_id = au.roleId left join rel_agt_company ac on ac.agt_id= au.u_id left join sys_company c on c.company_id = ac.company_id where au.u_name=#{u_name} and company_state=1 and u_status=1;
update agt_user set u_pass=#{pass2} where u_name=#{name} and u_pass=#{pass}
mapper.update: update agt_user set money_box=#{balance} where u_id = #{id};
mapper.select: select money_box from agt_user where u_id=#{id};
select user_id from sys_user su left join rel_user_keyword ruk on ruk.sys_user_id = su.user_id left join ag_keyword k on k.kw_id = ruk.keyword_id where k.kw_name = #{keyword}

select u_id as id, u_name as u_name, u_pass as u_pass, u_pass as u_pass, u_pass as u_pass, create_name as createName, create_time as createTime, update_name as updateName, update_time as updateTime from agt_user left join sys_role sr on sr.role_id = au.roleId left join rel_agt_company ac on ac.agt_id= au.fatherId left join sys_company c on c.company_id = ac.company_id where au.u_name=#{username} and company_state=1 and u_status=1;
mapper.sql:
from agt_user au left join rel_agt_company ac on ac.agt_id = au.u_id left join sys_company c on c.company_id = ac.company_id where 1=1 and c.company_state=1 and au.u_id!=#{id} and 2=au.roleId
and c.company_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
mapper.select: SELECT sys_company.company_id FROM rel_agt_company, sys_company where rel_agt_company.company_id = sys_company.company_id and rel_agt_company.agt_id =#{aid} and sys_company.company_state = 1
